Description: Adds a message to chat when a day killing occurs

TextInputSettings.Name: Deputy Message
TextInputSettings.Description: Message appearing when a deputy shoots someone. Valid variables: %deputy% for dep position, %deputyRole% for the deputy mention, and %target% for target position

TextInputSettings.Name: Prosecutor Message
TextInputSettings.Description: Message appearing when a prosecutor hangs someone. Valid variables: %prosecutor% for pros position, %prosecutorRole% for the prosecutor mention, and %target% for target position

TextInputSettings.Name: Conjurer Message
TextInputSettings.Description: Message appearing when a conjurer drops the meteor. Valid variables: %conjurerRole% for the conjurer mention, and %target% for target position

CheckboxSettings.Name: Show Reminder Message
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will make a message at the start of the voting phase if you didn't select a target yet as Jailor, Coroner or Pirate.
